title: Mobile Microlearning Based on Culturally Sustaining Pedagogy for Bilingual Literacy Development in Children of Migrant Agricultural Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design supporting language/cultural identity retention among migrant agricultural workers' children in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core principles of culturally sustaining pedagogy (cultural respect, language integration, community engagement) appropriately to given contexts.
Learners design five specific activities supporting biliteracy development in a mobile microlearning environment.
When developing language learning content executable in limited-technology environments, learners propose at least three culturally contextualized assessment criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
